attributes.action: LOWER THE PRICE OF MEDICATION  FOR SENIOR CITIZENS WHO NEED VIAGRA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
VIAGRA CAN BE PRESCRIBED BY A DOCTOR TO A SENIOR CITIZEN. THE COST IS APPROX. £40.00 (4 TABLETS)
MANY SENIOR CITIZENS WITH THIS MEDICATION CAN ENJOY A HEALTHY SEX LIFE. MANY FIND THE COST TOO HIGH.
